item.title: LEGO Tree House
item.description: This is my favorite LEGO set: Tree House. The tree house is amazing, there’re so many details. When I play with it, I can imagine I’m living in it. I found one drawback that the room was dark when the tree has top leaves. Hahaha! The real tree’s leaves make a shadow, too. How can I complain about it? But I have my own idea. I provided the electricity to the tree house, and lighted up the tree house.
